t: iONRx® Natural Hot Tub Sanitizing System – iONRx®
s: Add 4 oz. of iONRx® per 100 gallons directly to spa water every week. Choose which oxidizer you plan on using. An oxidizer is needed in order to keep your water crystal clear. See chart below for appropriate volumes. Maintain chlorine oxidizer levels at 0.5 ppm to 1ppm. Similar to drinking water. If you are choosing to use a NON-CHLORINE OXIDIZER, PLEASE REFER TO THE DIRECTIONS OF THE BRAND ...

iONRx® Pool & Spa Filter Cleaner – iONRx®
Finally got it dialed in
s: We have a 300 gal hot tub and just started using the wonderful IonRx weekly spa treatment a few weeks ago (see our IonRx review). This treatment requires only a very small amount of chlorine as a disinfectant (0.5 to 1.0 PPM), far less than what is required with old-fashioned chemicals.

t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: Buy the ionRx starter kit on Amazon. Once you receive product: Drain and clean your hot tub. Buy new filters. Fill tub and balance pH and Alkalinity. Use chart that comes with starter l kit to determine how much liquid and how many chlorine tablets you will need to use each week.
